attributes.action: Government must compensate flights lost during the re-quarantine rules!
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair to lost money ! Airlines should cancel the flights and pay back all cost!
attributes.background: Because after lockdown UK government opened for UK travelers Spain and rest countries , people bought the flights . And now they make quarantine again . Companies said “use or loose” but how to use if government not allowing to do it ?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912
